attributes.action: Remove John Prescott from the Offices of the Government Departments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the British public and the citizens of the United Kingdom who elect ministers to represent us to govern the country. We should be able to dismiss government ministers who fail to fulfil their departmental roles.
Mr Prescott is surplus to requirements.
He is the Deputy Pimeminister without a job?????
Let this government never forget that we the TAX  payers of the COUNTRY PAY their WAGES, therefore WE should have a SAY when THEY are SURPLUS to requirements.
